Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Limits temporary detention of defendants in violation of their release in a local correctional facility to 72 hours before transfer to state custody
Summary: Limits temporary detention of defendants in violation of their release in a local correctional facility to 72 hours before transfer to state custody.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to temporary detention of persons whose presumptive release, parole, conditional release or post-release supervision alleged to have violated the terms of their release
